languages.text: "Умолкни, элфкид, лесная фея. Твои наглые речи мерзки, и ты рискуешь воистину узреть зверя".
"Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."
languages.original_text: "Умолкни, элфкид, лесная фея. Твои наглые речи мерзки, и ты рискуешь воистину узреть зверя".

traits.locale_text: "Be silent, aelfkid, forest fey. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."
"Be silent, aelfkid, forest fey. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."
"Be silent, aelfkid, forest fey. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."
"Be silent, aelfkid, forest fey. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

languages.text: “闭嘴，再敢出言不逊，我就让你看看什么叫真正的野兽。”
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴吧，林中仙子。再敢出言不逊，我就让你看看什么叫真正的野兽。”

languages.text: « Silence. Encore un mot, et vous finirez par vous retrouver devant une véritable bête. »
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: « Silence, aelfkid. Encore un mot, et vous pourriez finir par vous retrouver devant une véritable bête. »

languages.text: "Schweigt! Noch mehr von Euren schändlichen, dreisten Worten, und Ihr bekommt wirklich eine Bestie zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt still, Aelfkind, Waldfeie. Noch mehr von Euren schändlichen, dreisten Worten, und Ihr bekommt wirklich eine Bestie zu sehen."

languages.text: 「黙れ。下劣で横柄な言動を続ければ、本当に獣を見ることになるかもしれないぞ」
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、森の妖精エルフキドよ。下劣で横柄な言動を続ければ、本当に獣を見ることになるかもしれないぞ」

languages.text: «Silencio. Si continúas con tus insolentes palabras, te arriesgas a ver una bestia de verdad».
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: «Silencio, aelfkid, hada del bosque. Si continúas con tus insolentes palabras, te arriesgas a ver una bestia de verdad».

languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

languages.text: "Kes sesini. Böyle adi ve küstahça konuşmaya devam edersen asıl canavarı o zaman görürsün."
languages.original_text: "Be silent. If you continue your vile and insolent speech, you may truly set eyes on a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Kes sesini. Böyle adi ve küstahça konuşmaya devam edersen asıl canavarı o zaman görürsün."
